scripts.start: npm run build && cd site/ && bundle exec jekyll serve
scripts.build: cd modules/base64 && webpack --mode=development && cd ../../site && bundle exec jekyll clean && bundle exec jekyll build && mkdir -p assets/dist/ && cp -R -f -v ../modules/base64/dist/* assets/dist/
scripts.release: cd modules/base64 && webpack --mode=production && cd ../../site && bundle exec jekyll clean && JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build && mkdir -p assets/dist/ && cp -R -f -v ../modules/base64/dist/* assets/dist/
scripts.upload: aws s3 sync --region us-west-1 site/_site/ s3://base64tool.com && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E2Q6C8FJZ1258Z --paths "/*"
scripts.clean: cd site && bundle exec jekyll clean
